General.Name: Conquest Resources Ltd
General.Description: Conquest Resources Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Ontario. The company explores for gold, copper, nickel, lithium, uranium, and other precious and base metals, as well as palladium group of elements. Its flagship property is the Belfast- TeckMag property that includes 1,390 mining claim cells and 5 mining leases covering an area of approximately 32,197 hectares located in the Temagami Mining Camp at Emerald Lake, Ontario. The company was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
